snippet.title: The Alters Story Trailer – PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
The Alters is a sci-fi colony sim with the fun twist that everyone in that colony is a clone of your main character. As you build out your mobile base on the hostile planet you’re stranded on, those clones develop their own quirky personalities. Ultimately, The Alters is about whether you can get along with yourself well enough to survive.

https://www.pcgamer.com

X: https://x.com/pcgamer

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgaming #PCGSMW #thealters
